title: Gildan Adult DryBlend Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Style G8400, 2-Pack
description: Cotton-soft moisture wicking fabric for active lifestyles
Taped neck and shoulders for comfort and durability
Tear away label for customizable comfort

With Gildan’s DryBlend Adult Long Sleeve T-shirt you can count on being as comfortable as possible through the day. It’s moisture-wicking technology will help evaporate sweat away from the body. When you add graphics in the form of DTG, screen printing, embroidery, heat transfers or discharge, you have a one-of-a-kind piece that matches your personal style.
